short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension customizes the LeetCode website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension replace the stopwatch on the toolbar of Leetcode's problem page.

The feature is simple:
- Start/Stop the stopwatch
- Auto start after 2 mins remaining on the problem
- Restore unstopped stopwatch for the next visit on the problem
